name: Too Many Cooks (daltondo)
description:
Fight hoards of zombies while trying to serve up tasty dishes!

Benjamin Cheung: Programmer - Cooking Station, Ingredient Combination

Dalton Do: Programmer - Player Interaction, Zombies, UI

Sheena Gonzalez: Artist - All art assets, background art, and animations

Jimmy Lee: Monkey, Programmer -  Player Movement/Attack, Cutting Board

Dev Blog: https://toomanycooks.home.blog/

Game created for UC Berkeley's Game Design and Development DeCal (https://gamedesign.berkeley.edu/decal.php)
